docs.snippet: The Franco-German economic agreement is only a first step. It goes to show that a new principle actuates French policy: the conviction that the great manufacturing nations must reach an agreement to share the world's trade.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Oct. 4.--With only a month lacking until the date set for the general elections in Argentina, indications here are that the political situation is far from tranquil.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 4 (AP).--President Gabriel Terra of Uru  guay is ill. He is a veteran figure in Uruguayan politics and has been President since March 1.
